1.train.SRC: one party sized stuffed crusts pizza with american cheese and a lot of peperonni
1.train.TOP: (ORDER (PIZZAORDER (NUMBER one ) (SIZE party sized ) (STYLE stuffed crusts ) pizza with (TOPPING american cheese ) and (COMPLEX_TOPPING (QUANTITY a lot of ) (TOPPING peperonni ) ) ) )
1.train.TOP-DECOUPLED: (ORDER (PIZZAORDER (NUMBER one ) (SIZE party sized ) (STYLE stuffed crusts ) (TOPPING american cheese ) (COMPLEX_TOPPING (QUANTITY a lot of ) (TOPPING peperonni ) ) ) )

2.train.SRC: five 20 fl oz diet ice teas
2.train.TOP: (ORDER (DRINKORDER (NUMBER five ) (VOLUME 20 fl oz ) (DRINKTYPE diet ice teas ) ) )
2.train.TOP-DECOUPLED: (ORDER (DRINKORDER (NUMBER five ) (VOLUME 20 fl oz ) (DRINKTYPE diet ice teas ) ) )

3.train.SRC: i'd like 7 pizza with beans and ten coffees
